text: Marilyn Horne (born January 16, 1934) is an American opera singer. She is a mezzo-soprano. She has won four Grammy Awards. She was born in Bradford, Pennsylvania. She grew up in Long Beach, California. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:American opera singers Category:American Grammy Award winners Category:Musicians from Long Beach, California Category:Singers from Los Angeles County, California Category:Singers from Pennsylvania
title: Marilyn Horne
